column5: The start of March seems as good a time as any for a report of this nature and size.  A little tease first.         Stay tuned.
Hey kickingfrog where ya headed up there??  I went to Pangnirtung on Baffin Island 2 years ago to build a hospital up there...what a different world can't wait to see some of the pics.
Awesome, something to look forward to.
A report from an eloquent photographer from a magnificent region of our land. This should be a hot report! Looking forward to it.
Mother nature at it's finest right there! Need that report post haste!
I hope you're not going alone. Don't want worm dangler to think you're an idiot now.  What river are ya doing?
i cant wait to see it.  quite a different vacation than bikinis and margaritas in the sunny carribean...
It was a trip I did a few years ago.  Horton River, NWT.  I've been going through old film and have been putting the shots on the computer.
Sweet!  How was the fishing?  I've paddled the Coppermine and Nahanni.  The former the fishing was out of this world amazing for Artic Char...
Looking forward to it.   Will be great to see a part of your country, that few really get to see.
